content: last single_crochet turn 6 single_crochet row 4 chain 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet across turn row 5 chain 1 single_crochet in first single_crochet skip next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet twice single_crochet in last single_crochet turn 4 single_crochet row 6 chain 1 single_crochet in first single_crochet skip next single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet turn 3 single_crochet row 7 chain 1 insert hook in first single_crochet and draw up a loop 2 loops on hook skip next single_crochet insert hook in last single_crochet and draw up a loop 3 loops on hook yarn over and draw through all loops on hook fasten_off with rs facing and working across opposite side of foundation chain join yarn with slip_stitch in first chain chain 1 single_crochet in each chain across 3 single_crochet repeat row 2 7 for other end of bow fasten_off bow center chain 6 join with slip_stitch in first chain to form a ring taking care not to twist chain round 1 chain 1 single_crochet in each chain around join with slip_stitch in first single_crochet do not turn 6 single_crochet round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet around join with slip_stitch in first single_crochet fasten_off finishing insert bow into bow center sew bow to side of band as shown in photograph using yarn needle weave in all ends || yarns || free projects || where to buy || links || learning || contact us || caron connections || news || latch hook || visit bond america online ©2010 caron international http //www caron com/projects/slip_stitch/ss_elegant_hat html page 3 of 3
